Experience

The privately-owned, award-winning Ghost Mountain Inn lies at the foot of the legendary Ghost Mountain in Mkuze.
This beautiful hotel is the ideal location from which to explore the game & coastal reserves of the Elephant Coast.

Stay

Ghost Mountain Inn offers a variety of room types. These include 22 standard rooms, 19 superior rooms, 8 garden rooms, 21 mountain rooms, 1 junior suite, 1 Obonjeni Suite, 1 Gaza Suite & 1 Tshaneni Suite.
The standard rooms have private patios with garden or courtyard views. The superior rooms offer either water, mountain or pool views. The garden rooms have spacious lounges & offer garden or pool views. The spacious mountain rooms offer mountain, water or garden views as well as a day bed that can accommodate a third person.
The junior suite is located on the upper level & offers views across the gardens toward the Lebombo Mountains & additional space as well as a small kitchenette & open plan lounge.
The private Obonjeni Suite features a separate living room, bedroom & changing room as well as an outdoor shower set in a secluded garden.
The most spacious suites, The Gaza & Tshaneni Suites, offer ample space for guests needing more residential-style accommodation. These suites each features a living area with a kitchenette, guest bathroom, spacious bedroom with dressing room, large terrace in the garden as well as an indoor & outdoor shower & standalone bathtub.

Activities

Activities at Ghost Mountain Inn include game drives, guided walks, boat cruises & spa treatments.

subfolders.title: Cleopatra Mountain Farmhouse
subfolders.description: Cleopatra Mountain Farmhouse is a romantic gourmet getaway with a spectacular location alongside a mountain river brimming with trout.   Adjoining the Giants Castle Nature Reserve in the heart of the spectacular Drakensberg mountain range, this rustic, yet luxurious owner-run mountain retreat is the ideal holiday experience for nature-lovers.

subfolders.title: Ghost Mountain Inn
subfolders.description: The privately-owned, award-winning Ghost Mountain Inn lies at the foot of the legendary Ghost Mountain in Mkuze. This beautiful hotel is the ideal location from which to explore the game & coastal reserves of the Elephant Coast.

subfolders.title: Makakatana Bay Lodge
subfolders.description: The family-owned & run Makakatana Bay Lodge boasts a spectacular location in a dune forest within the St Lucia Estuary in the Isimangaliso Wetland Park – a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The lodge provides a secluded getaway in the outstanding natural surroundings but is only a 2 & a half hour drive from Durban – making this easily accessible for self-drive guests.

subfolders.title: Phinda Forest Lodge
subfolders.description: The spectacular Phinda Forest Lodge is set deep within the heart of a rare & beautiful dry sand forest in the Kwazulu Natal’s Phinda Resource Reserve. The reserve is home to a variety of wildlife & big game - including common sightings of lion, elephant, buffalo, rhino & giraffe.  This award-winning lodge was built on eco-sensitive structures with a light footprint (not one tree was felled during construction).

subfolders.title: Phinda Mountain Lodge
subfolders.description: Phinda Mountain Lodge lies in the gorgeous Zululand bushveld, in Kwazulu Natal’s Phinda Resource Reserve.  Home to the Big 5, Phinda provides phenomenal game viewing year-round. With wrap-around views of the magnificent Lebombo mountain range, Phinda Game Reserve is a dramatic safari destination of note.  The reserve has a huge diversity of landscapes – with lake, mountain & coastal plain views from the lodge.

subfolders.title: Phinda Rock Lodge
subfolders.description: The luxurious Phinda Rock Lodge is set amongst a cliff-face in the magnificent Phinda Resource Reserve in Kwazulu Natal. A variety of wildlife & big game can be seen here.  Frequent sightings of lion, elephant, buffalo, rhino & giraffe can be expected.  Spectacular sunsets can be enjoyed from the comfort of the west-facing viewing deck, which is suspended over the bushveld.

subfolders.title: Phinda Vlei Lodge
subfolders.description: Phinda Vlei Lodge is set in Kwazulu Natal’s beautiful Phinda Resource Reserve & is home to a variety of wildlife, including the famous Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino. The lodge is situated below the Lebombo Mountain range, overlooking a large wetland (vlei).  This wildlife playground brings your game encounters up close & personal.  Each morning & early evening the animals appear, so guests will have ample opportunity to enjoy game viewing from the comfort of the lodge’s viewing deck.

subfolders.title: Rhino Ridge Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Rhino Ridge Safari Lodge is the first private lodge within Africa’s oldest proclaimed reserve – Hluhluwe-Umfolozi Park.   Thanks to a triumph of conservation efforts, this Kwazulu-Natal reserve is home to one of the largest populations of white rhinos in the world, bringing the species back from the edge of extinction.

subfolders.title: Thanda Tented Camp
subfolders.description: Thanda, meaning ‘love’ in Zulu, is a celebration of Zulu people & their rich culture.  With an excellent location on the Elephant Coast in Kwazulu Natal, Thanda Private Game Reserve provides fantastic Big 5 game viewing in a remote & pristine setting. Thanda Tented Camp enjoys a beautiful location on a hill, offering spectacular views of the bushveld.

subfolders.title: Thonga Beach Lodge
subfolders.description: Thonga Beach Lodge is set on the pristine shores of the Maputaland Coast in Kwazulu-Natal – the ideal place to discover one of Africa’s last unspoiled wilderness beaches. This magical place offers coastal forests, grasslands, bush, shimmering lakes & exquisite sandy beaches.  It is here where guests can enjoy South Africa’s best snorkelling & off-shore scuba diving in crystal clear, warm waters.

subfolders.title: Three Tree Hill Lodge
subfolders.description: Three Tree Hill Lodge is set against the magnificent backdrop of the Drakensberg Mountains & overlooks the secluded Mfazimnyama Valley of the Spioenkop Game Reserve. This beautiful lodge offers spectacular scenery, locally grown farm-style country food & superb hospitality.

whatWeLoveItems: Picturesque location in the Zululand hills
Enjoy magnificent sunsets from the Lebombo cliffs
Exciting walking safaris in Mkuze Game Reserve
Spa, steam room, pool, gym & tennis courts
